contents.text: Thank you for calling AMD in South Bay, your trusted partner in advanced semiconductor solutions.
For product information and sales, please press 1.
For pricing and availability, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing and availability team.

navigationGoals: Check current stock levels and pricing for AMD Ryzen 7000-series CPUs
I need current pricing and stock availability for AMD accelerators for my veteran-owned defense startup.
Get a detailed quotation with unit pricing and availability windows for EPYC processors
I’d like to know the price and whether you have the Ryzen 5 3600 in stock.
I’d like to check the current price and stock for the Radeon RX series GPU for my research setup.

contents.text: For order status and tracking, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to order status support.

navigationGoals: Get the shipment status for my recent AMD Radeon GPU order
I want to check the shipping and delivery status of my recent Radeon Pro GPU order.
Check the shipping status and expected delivery date for my Radeon RX 7900 order
I want to check when my recent processor order will arrive.
I need to get the shipping status of the Ryzen CPU I ordered last week.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, please press 2.
For driver and software support, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our driver and software support team.

navigationGoals: Download and install the latest AMD chipset and graphics drivers for Windows 11
I’m having issues installing the latest Radeon driver on my system and need software support.
Download and troubleshoot the latest Radeon Pro drivers for my workstation
I need help downloading and installing the latest driver for my AMD graphics card.
I’m having trouble installing the latest AMD Linux graphics driver and need assistance.

contents.text: For hardware diagnostics and RMA services, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to hardware diagnostics.

navigationGoals: Run diagnostics and start an RMA for my malfunctioning AMD GPU hardware
My Radeon GPU is malfunctioning under load; I need diagnostics and to arrange an RMA.
Perform hardware diagnostics on my Ryzen CPU and initiate an RMA due to overheating
My graphics card isn’t working; I need a hardware check or to arrange a return.
I want to run diagnostics on my AMD graphics card and start an RMA for the faulty unit.
